title: Pop Up alphabet book ships
content:
Hi, this brilliant pop-up alphabet book i blogged about last Spring is shipping now.

Check it out:

[http://www.amazon.com/ABC3D-Marion-Bataille/dp/1596434252/ref=wl\_it\_dp?ie=UTF8&coliid=I3U37DNSD1VSDQ&colid=1S96BZ92JRMMK](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824065035/http:/www.amazon.com/ABC3D-Marion-Bataille/dp/1596434252/ref=wl_it_dp?ie=UTF8&coliid=I3U37DNSD1VSDQ&colid=1S96BZ92JRMMK)

Jason C
author: jasonc
